DrugName: Corticosteroid cream (e.g. hydrocortisone) for wound care
Pain relievers (e.g. acetaminophen or ibuprofen) for pain management
Antibiotics (e.g. amoxicillin or ciprofloxacin) for infection prophylaxis
Anti-inflammatory medications (e.g. prednisone) for post-operative care
Iron supplements (e.g. ferrous sulfate) for iron deficiency anemia
Thyroid hormone replacement therapy (e.g. levothyroxine) for hypothyroidism
Anticoagulant medication (e.g. enoxaparin or warfarin) for blood clot prevention
Nasal decongestants (e.g. oxymetazoline or azelastine) for allergic rhinitis
